name: ai-derma-detector-backend
description: AI Derma Detector Backend - Python FastAPI with ONNX Model

scripts.start: echo 'Use Python to start: python main.py' && exit 1
scripts.dev: echo 'Use Python for development: uvicorn main:app --reload' && exit 1
scripts.install: echo 'Use pip to install: pip install -r requirements.txt' && exit 1

note: This backend now uses Python/FastAPI instead of Node.js. Use 'pip install -r requirements.txt' to install dependencies and 'python main.py' to start the server.
